        <u_beschreibung>- IT in traditional industry (porter value chain, IT Enterprise Systems)
- digitization and disruptiveness

- service dominant logic- user centered innovation

- context aware solutions

- important technologies:

- RFID/NFC

- web services

- mobile technologies

The course focuses on methods to cope with these challenges.</u_beschreibung>
